name: Twigram: Grow Your Influence
description:
Twigram: Grow Your Influence is a game created for Northeastern University's Game Science and Design program. The game is heavily inspired by recent events, including the war in Ukraine and the protests in Iran. The purpose of the game is to comment on the absurd power social media has over the world, and to encourage player's to be considerate about how their posts can influence lives of others.
